dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6768 IH: To amend the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 to reauthorize the First Responder Network Authority.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Demings (for herself and Mrs. Fletcher) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 to reauthorize the First Responder Network Authority.

section.header: Reauthorization of First Responder Network Authority
section.text: Section 6206 of the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 (47 U.S.C. 1426) is amended by striking subsections (f) and (g).
